World Series
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: A bloody sock worn by Curt Schilling while pitching for the Boston Red Sox in Game 2 of the 2004 World Series sold for $92,613 at an auction in Manhattan.
snippet: A bloody sock worn by Curt Schilling while pitching for the Boston Red Sox in Game 2 of the 2004 World Series sold for $92,613 at an auction in Manhattan.
